page.title: 04AGRICULTURE
page.content: {Agriculture }is the principal industry of the {Biggar}area.The mainstay of the farms in the area is stock rearing with an emphasis on sheep especially in the Upland parts of the district.However some farms in the valley bottom keep cattle;the most succesful of these is perhaps {Boghall {Farm},where a dairy businees is run from.The other important aspects of the farming scene in Biggar are the { {Auction Market }and the {Slaughter {House. }Of these perhaps the most important is the {Slaughter House} ,which markets its products under the name Biggar Beef. This business is now worth over two million pounds and much of the business is done south of the Border.Finally there is an important Agricultural Show in July,which attracts a large number of people to the area.
